data.name: Ultimate Zombie Defense - The Carnival Map
data.detailed_description: Enter the CARNIVAL! The much anticipated first content pack for ULTIMATE ZOMBIE DEFENSE. Explore the large, abandoned carnival map full of rides and games and clear it of the undead once and for all. BEWARE OF THE CLOWN!
data.about_the_game: Enter the CARNIVAL! The much anticipated first content pack for ULTIMATE ZOMBIE DEFENSE. Explore the large, abandoned carnival map full of rides and games and clear it of the undead once and for all. BEWARE OF THE CLOWN!
data.short_description: Enter the CARNIVAL! The much anticipated first content pack for ULTIMATE ZOMBIE DEFENSE. Explore the large, abandoned carnival map full of rides and games and clear it of the undead once and for all. BEWARE OF THE CLOWN!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Dutch*, French*, Italian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 5000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.5GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI GPU (Intel GPUs unsupported)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI GPU (Intel GPUs unsupported)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
